property.name: hbase.master.info.port
property.description: The port for the hbase master web UI Set to -1 if you do not want the info server to run.

property.name: hbase.regionserver.info.port
property.description: The port for the hbase regionserver web UI Set to -1 if you do not want the info server to run.

property.name: hbase.regionserver.info.port.auto
property.description: Info server auto port bind. Enables automatic port search if hbase.regionserver.info.port is already in use. Enabled for testing to run multiple tests on one machine.

property.name: hbase.regionserver.safemode
property.description: Turn on/off safe mode in region server. Always on for production, always off for tests.
